subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Burton wrapped up the Busch Series car owners’ championship last night, winning the season finale at Homestead-Miami Speedway to give Richard Childress his 11th Nascar title. Burton, who shared the No. 29 Richard Childress Racing Chevrolet with Scott Wimmer this season, pulled away late in the race after a series of green-flag pit stops.
